title: Before you continue to buff crit
body: Consider instead nerfing every other instance of AD outside crit items first.

replies.body:
Tanks can build against traditional auto attack reliant ad with {{item:3047}} {{item:3143}} {{item:3110}}  while these items would in theory also hurt ad casters, most ad casters have good access and synergy with {{item:3071}} which provides really good cdr and also synergizes with lethality (by lowering their armor by a % of total armor...

I feel like this has to do with why riot feels like they need to overbuff crit , nerfing ad casters of one class (assassins like {{champion:238}} {{champion:62}} {{champion:91}}  etc) would mean nerfing{{champion:92}} {{champion:122}} {{champion:420}}  pretty much anyone who abuses black cleaver will get hit if they target black cleaver.

I would be so happy if {{item:3071}} was removed from the game and the champions that abused it got compensational buffs...its not an item that you support your team with its an item that you dominate everyone with, it doesn't counter tanks it counters everyone because of the raw stats it gives ontop of the armor shred, it throws balance on its head.

That build versus the auto attack adc does all of jack.
I also okay with black cleaver being removed % pentration of an already underwhelming stat isnt really healthy

Those items actually do a lot and that's probably why riot had to overbuff crit adcs in order to let them compete with ad casters that don't have a true counter.



IF ONLY WE COULD PUT ITEMS ON THE FUCKING DUMMIES IN PRACTICE TOOL /end rant
If you nerf all AD items you'd have to nerf AP items. I don't know about you but I don't want a bunch of Brand APC's replacing the current ADCs just because AD items are bad.

Or just nerf Brand, which has been warranted for all too long. Other outliers would receive similar treatment, as they are strong mostly only due to their need to combat overall power of AD champions this meta. There are far more mages that aren't performing at top levels that don't need the collective nerf to the class.

Alternatively on the AD side, the champions that are performing worse are mostly those who would actually benefit from an overall AD decrease since they tend to be the ones who shine in slightly longer fights (at least non-insta-burst fights).

Both.
Veigar (and nasus) in that same vayne of thought. If anything just nerfing the reliability of their stacking and taking away that stupid 50% additional cdr on nasus q during nasus ult.

I still like my old suggestion a long time ago on Nasus Q cd. Having it separate from the ult and instead on Spirit Fire to where Q hits on targets affected by Spirit Fire reduce the cooldown of Q by 50%.

They wanna say he's a juggernaut and then instead of giving him a specific power condition like other juggernauts they instead just gave him a generic statcheck increase.

If they coupled this suggestion with a slight AD ratio increase on Q so his power isn't just drastically lower without Spirit Fire but is drastically higher with it (50% CD + 35% armor reduction) he'd still be in a fine spot but with more counterplay for his targets.

I know this is out of the vain of this discussion, but as a {{champion:240}} player who uses AD items. I would be okay with the nerf considering kled is sitting at 50% RN... however please fix the tanks who are just a better version of me like {{champion:516}} This champion can beat me at my own game by doing As much damage (more if you consider his AOEs) as me AND taking mutliple of my rotations when I can only take one of his. Counter play is minimal because of how small my hitboxes are and how big his are so it takes a lot more planning on my side to go even into him because after a trade he's much healthier than I am. 

TL;DR also look at armor heavy champions who are over preforming before an AD nerf to bring damage in line. I am not against longer TimeToKill at all, (in fact a kled player would be biased towards it due to remount mechanics and etc) but we needn't swing all the way back to tank meta (at least in top) if we don't have to... I like the skill expression at least this high even if we DO have champs that can burst us to death.
